name: [Identity] Base
desc: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat. If the user does not meet the requirements for this W-Engine, then carrying it would be like lugging around an over-sized shield in battle.
desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat.
phaseDescs: When attacked, the equipper's DEF increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> for 8s.
When attacked, the equipper's DEF increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>23%</ct> for 8s.
When attacked, the equipper's DEF increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>26%</ct> for 8s.
When attacked, the equipper's DEF increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>29%</ct> for 8s.
When attacked, the equipper's DEF increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>32%</ct> for 8s.
